content: complimentary pattern holiday frost snowflakes design by bobbi intveld pattern no for use with 202349 woolstok worsted for use with woolstok worsted holiday frost snowflakes design by bobbi intveld description add joy to your holidays with these beautiful knit snowflakes three festive designs to pick from and each one takes only one mini experience level gauge in stockinette st 6 sts and 7 row = 1 advanced beginner sizes finished measurements width from point to point 4½ one snowflake 1 5¼ snowflake 2 5 snowflake 3 materials yarn needles 4mm double pointed needles or size needed woolstok worsted bundle size 6 to obtain gauge 100% fine highland wool 21 mini hanks 5g/12yds 1 bundle holiday frost color shown color shown no 1301 no 1318 storm cloud a thermal spring b color shown color shown no 1305 no 1320 october sky c spring ice d color shown color shown no 1312 no 1303 drift wood e highland fleece f color shown no 1304 grey harbor g p 02 blue sky fibers other tools tapestry needle notes leaving short tails one mini hank will complete one snowflake all snowflakes begin working in the round and then worked in row for each point step no 1 snowflakes snowflake #1 rounded edges fo co 6 sts join in the round being careful not to twist sts join yarn work row 1-9 over next 7 sts repeat until all 6 points are complete k round 1 *k1 lli repeat from * to end 12 sts round 2 snowflake #2 picot edge k round 3 co 12 sts join in the round being careful not to twist sts *k1 yo k1 repeat from * to end 18 sts round 4 k round 1 k round 5 *k2 lli repeat from * to end 18
